footer.description: We are a lean team of builders working in person in NYC, backed by world-class investors such as Neo, Cal Henderson, Maria Zhang, Adam Freed, Russell Kaplan, and others.
footer.title: Unstuck AI's first product was launched from our college dorm room in January 2023. Experiencing firsthand the shortcomings of the one-size-fits-all education system, we are on a mission to fix it through applied AI research and building delightful products.

question1.ans: Unstuck accepts various file types including text documents, images, audio files, and videos.
question1.que: What type of files are accepted on Unstuck?

question2.ans: Unstuck utilizes advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze and process input data, providing insights, predictions, or performing specific tasks based on user requirements.

question3.ans: Unstuck distinguishes itself through its user-friendly interface, robust performance, and versatility. It offers a wide range of features tailored for various industries and use cases, setting it apart from other AI tools.
question3.que: How is Unstuck different from other AI tools?

question4.ans: Unstuck offers flexible usage plans. Each plan may have different usage limits depending on the subscription level chosen.
question4.que: Are there usage limits for Unstuck?

question5.ans: Unstuck is used for tasks such as data analysis, natural language processing, image recognition, predictive modeling, and more. It finds applications across various industries including healthcare, finance, marketing, and education.
